Distribution .
C. capreola
was described from Cameroon and later recorded from CAR , Democratic Republic of Congo , Equatorial Guinea , Ghana and Liberia ( Griffini 1906 , Huxley 1970 , Naskrecki 2009 , Massa 2013 ).
